Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-45142 affecting package moby-compose for versions less than 2.17.3-7
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-45142 affecting package moby-compose for versions less than 2.17.3-7. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package moby-compose is earlier than 2.17.3-7, affected by CVE-2023-45142
